entries.meaning: A plan for making changes to the structure and functions of an artifact, building or system so as to better serve the purpose of the original design, or to serve purposes different from those set forth in the original design.

verbs.description: redesign (third-person singular simple present redesigns, present participle redesigning, simple past and past participle redesigned)

entries.meaning: To lay out or plan a new version of something previously laid out or planned.
